ing: 2 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cubed
1/2 (4 ounce) package crumbled tomato and basil feta cheese (such as AthenosÂ®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "I'm always looking for new ways to make mashed potatoes, and this recipe came together one day when I was trying to use up some feta cheese. The feta and capers add a nice tang and give the potatoes a unique flavor that will leave your guests asking for the recipe! Serve hot."
ins:
Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain.
Mix feta cheese, butter, milk, capers, garlic, salt, and pepper into the potatoes. Mash with a potato masher or electric mixer to desired consistency.
